naslov: Istra, Višnjan - Vila 402m2 s pogledom na more (prodaja)
opis: Angencija za nekretnine Angelus Nekretnine d.o.o. nude Vam na prodaju ovu luksuznu vilu s bazenom na zapadnoj obali Istre sa predivnim pogledom na more. LOKACIJA: Samo nekoliko kilometara od prekrasne jadranske obale, ova fantastična vila u blizini Višnjana nudi savršeno utočište za entuzijastične ljubitelje Istre. Slikovite plaže i kristalno čisto more Jadrana pozivaju vas na opuštanje Dani na moru, za plivanje i ronjenje. Poznati obalni gradovi Poreč i Novigrad udaljeni su samo nekoliko minuta vožnje i nude razne aktivnosti za slobodno vrijeme i razne vodene sportove. Međunarodna zračna luka Pula udaljena je samo sat vremena vožnje i nudi brojne veze s većim europskim gradovima. Zračna luka Rijeka i privatna zračna luka u Portorožu, također lako dostupne, nude dodatne mogućnosti pristupa i odlaska. OPIS: Ova luksuzna vila smještena je na zapadnoj obali istarskog poluotoka u blizini Višnjana, nedalko Novigrada (grada na moru). Ova vila predstavlja skladni spoj moderne elegancije i mediteranskog štiha. Ova lokacija nudi mir,  na osamljenom mjestu proteže se na približno 400 m² stambenog prostora širok izbor prostora i uz senzacionalan pogled na more. Ova vila je projektirana u modernom stilu sa elementima mediteranskog te impresionira svjetlom ispunjenom kuhinjom, blagovaonicom i prostranim dnevnim boravkom. Interijer je u ugodnom mediteranskom stilu, a otvoreni kamin u središtu sobe stvara topao ambijent. Staklena klizna vrata od poda do stropa stvaraju besprijekornu vezu s vanjskim prostorom i maksimalnu osunčanost. Osim WC-a za goste, spavaća soba s kupaonicom (ensuite i pristup invalidskim kolicima) upotpunjuje atraktivan interijer prizemlja. Na katu se nalaze dvije spavaće sobe sa zajedničkom kupaonicom, kao i još jedna spavaća soba, koja ima en-suite kupaonicu i fantastičan pogled na more nudi obilje svijetlosti. Središnje mjesto na katu zauzima prostrana glavna spavaća soba s privatnom i natkrivenom krovnom terasom, garderobom i elegantnom vlastitom kupaonicom. Veliki ugradbeni ormari i praonica rublja u hodniku te pristupačno vanjsko stubište koje vodi do ogromne krovne terase s fantastičnim pogledom na tirkizno more i susjedni maslinik, još jednom naglašavaju pozornost posvećenu detaljima dobro promišljenom planiranju nekretnine. Zemljište je veličine 2534m2 na kojem središnje mjesto zauzima prostrani bazen s 50 m² površine te natkrivena ljetnu kuhinju i pripadajuću terasa pa sunčanje ili roštiljanje. U cijeni je sadržano i zemljište ukupne površine 3418 preko puta, odmah uz zemljište kuće sa otprilike 80 odraslih maslina koje svake godine donose plod. Za sva pitanja i informacije ili za dogovor termina pregleda nekretnine kontaktirajte nas već danas, a na poveznici https://angelusnekretnine.hr/o-nama možete pogledati naše Opće uvjete poslovanja. _____________________________________________ ENG: The real estate agency Angelus Nekretnine d.o.o. offers you for sale this luxury villa with a swimming pool on the west coast of Istria with a beautiful sea view. LOCATION: Just a few kilometers from the beautiful Adriatic coast, this fantastic villa near Višnjan offers the perfect retreat for enthusiastic Istrian lovers. The picturesque beaches and crystal clear Adriatic sea invite you to relax. Days at the sea, for swimming and diving. The famous coastal towns of Poreč and Novigrad are only a few minutes' drive away and offer a variety of leisure activities and various water sports. The international airport of Pula is only an hour's drive away and offers numerous connections to major European cities. Rijeka Airport and the private airport in Portorož, also easily accessible, offer additional access and departure options. DESCRIPTION: This luxury villa is located on the west coast of the Istrian peninsula near Višnjan, not far from Novigrad (a town by the sea). This villa represents a harmonious blend of modern elegance and Mediterranean flair. This location offers peace, a wide range of spaces and a sensational sea view, extending over approximately 400 m² of living space in a secluded location. This villa is designed in a modern style with Mediterranean elements and impresses with a light-filled kitchen, dining area and spacious living room. The interior is in a cozy Mediterranean style, and an open fireplace in the center of the room creates a warm ambiance. Floor-to-ceiling glass sliding doors create a seamless connection to the outside space and maximum sunlight. In addition to the guest toilet, a bedroom with bathroom (ensuite and wheelchair accessible) completes the attractive interior of the ground floor. Upstairs there are two bedrooms with a shared bathroom, as well as another bedroom, which has an en-suite bathroom and fantastic sea views offering plenty of light. The centerpiece of the upper floor is the spacious master bedroom with its private and covered roof terrace, dressing room and elegant en suite bathroom. Large built-in wardrobes and a laundry room in the hallway, as well as an accessible external staircase leading to a huge roof terrace with a fantastic view of the turquoise sea and the neighboring olive grove, once again emphasize the attention to detail and well-thought-out planning of the property. The plot is 2534m2, on which the centerpiece is a spacious 50 m² swimming pool and a covered summer kitchen and terrace for sunbathing or grilling. The price also includes a plot of land with a total area of ​​3418 m2 across the street, right next to the house plot with approximately 80 mature olive trees that bear fruit every year. For all questions and information or to arrange a property inspection, contact us today, and at the link https://angelusnekretnine.hr/o-nama you can view our General Terms and Conditions.
